channel.title: Project Near-Reality | 23 Skills fully working | Most realistic NR Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://near-realityps.com/Forums/images/greenfox/buttons/logobanner.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2dtq146.png[/img] [URL=http://www.near-realityps.com/Forums/cbacmos/cmps_index.php?pageid=p]Play Now[/URL]
[URL=http://www.near-realityps.com]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://www.near-realityps.com/Forums/forumdisplay.php?f=17]News & Announcements[/URL]
[URL=http://www.near-realityps.com/Forums/forumdisplay.php?f=19/]Updates[/URL]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/oix68.png[/img]
- [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/zkgw9j.png[/img] - • Re-worked the formula's everything should be balanced. • Magic has been re-worked it now has defence bonuses. • Clipped following with any magic/combat item. • Perfect attack styles and animation. • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons. • Tier/bounty/Kill Streak system Implemented. • Barraging/Ice blitzing with switches are faster and better than before. • Flawless switching.
- [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/142adti.png[/img] - • Perfect clipped following for all styles, and walking for NPCs. • Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs. • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs. • Npcs don't walk on top of one another. • Multi barrage. • Drops are all Announced if there rare. • PVM Point System with shop
- [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/j83313.png[/img] - • King Black dragon • Dagannoth kings • Chaos elemental • Kalphite queen • Godwars Bosses • Nex • Gano • Night-Gazer • Donator boss • Nomad • Barrelchest • Decaying Avatar • Avatar of Destruction • Avatar of Creation • Corperal beast • Bork • Tormented demons • Revenants • Strykewyrms • Frost dragons • Chaos tunnels • Mithril dragons • Slayer dungeon
- [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/zydqqd.png[/img] - • Fight caves • Fight pits • Warriors guild • Duel arena • Castle Wars • Barrows • Zombie Minigame • Bloodlust
- [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/28i7x1k.png[/img] - • Max cape and Completionist Cape with Customizing Colors • Skillers Cape for Combat level 3 Skillers with 99's • Custom Skilling Package for Skills • Custom Skilling Zone • Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations. • Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling. • Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling. • Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, and super prayer potions. • Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well. • Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations. • Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out. • Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back. • Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations. • Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks. • Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash. • Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce. • Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.
- [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/i2j1g4.png[/img] -
[SPOILER=Media]KQ [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/qpi6au.jpg[/img]
Nomad [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/jg1wkx.jpg[/img]
Casket NPC's [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ranrr8.jpg[/img]
Night-gazer [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/29pdo3s.jpg[/img]
Sea Monster [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/27xe61d.png[/img]
Gano [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/r1l6o8.jpg[/img]
Avatars [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2j4t0ch.png[/img]
Zombie Minigame [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/21ne0eq.png[/img]
Hoilday Quest [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2rq20ir.png[/img]
Achievement Shop [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/11kbajt.png[/img]
Skilling Zone [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/9779k5.png[/img]
Monster Teleport [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/68he7d.png[/img]
Comp Cape Customizer [video]http://gyazo.com/db171a60aff6c5ff06b64ae1aaf1bb8c[/video][/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

I played for 5 minutes, killed like 10 npc and had max combat then proceeded to log of boredom.

item.title: Project Near-Reality | 23 Skills fully working | Most realistic NR Remake
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:3, topic:549431”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=668332.msg4469789#msg4469789 date=1422333467]
Been a long while since I’ve been to the community, hope all is going well with it.
[/quote]

If you’re talking about our “remake”, this isn’t the same one.

Nice to see you again, though, James.[/quote]
Damnit… this is the second time I’ve done that with these posts, not paying full attention. If I recall, the other thread by another owner has the same layout of the thread lmao.

Anyway, nice to see what you’re doing with this then LOL. I’ll be keeping tabs on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Near-Reality | 23 Skills fully working | Most realistic NR Remake
item.dc:creator: @rage_0wnz rage 0wnz
item.description:
@rage_0wnz wrote:

[CENTER]


[URL=http://www.near-realityps.com/Forums/cbacmos/cmps_index.php?pageid=p]Play Now[/URL]

[URL=http://www.near-realityps.com]Website[/URL]

[URL=http://www.near-realityps.com/Forums/forumdisplay.php?f=17]News & Announcements[/URL]

[URL=http://www.near-realityps.com/Forums/forumdisplay.php?f=19/]Updates[/URL]

  • -
    • Re-worked the formula’s everything should be balanced.
    • Magic has been re-worked it now has defence bonuses.
    • Clipped following with any magic/combat item.
    • Perfect attack styles and animation.
    • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons.
    • Tier/bounty/Kill Streak system Implemented.
    • Barraging/Ice blitzing with switches are faster and better than before.
    • Flawless switching.

  • -
    • Perfect clipped following for all styles, and walking for NPCs.
    • Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs.
    • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs.
    • Npcs don’t walk on top of one another.
    • Multi barrage.
    • Drops are all Announced if there rare.
    • PVM Point System with shop

  • -
    • King Black dragon
    • Dagannoth kings
    • Chaos elemental
    • Kalphite queen
    • Godwars Bosses
    • Nex
    • Gano
    • Night-Gazer
    • Donator boss
    • Nomad
    • Barrelchest
    • Decaying Avatar
    • Avatar of Destruction
    • Avatar of Creation
    • Corperal beast
    • Bork
    • Tormented demons
    • Revenants
    • Strykewyrms
    • Frost dragons
    • Chaos tunnels
    • Mithril dragons
    • Slayer dungeon

  • -
    • Fight caves
    • Fight pits
    • Warriors guild
    • Duel arena
    • Castle Wars
    • Barrows
    • Zombie Minigame
    • Bloodlust

  • -
    • Max cape and Completionist Cape with Customizing Colors
    • Skillers Cape for Combat level 3 Skillers with 99’s
    • Custom Skilling Package for Skills
    • Custom Skilling Zone
    • Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations.
    • Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
    • Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
    • Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, and super prayer potions.
    • Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well.
    • Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations.
    • Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out.
    • Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.
    • Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations.
    • Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks.
    • Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash.
    • Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce.
    • Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.

  • -

[SPOILER=Media]KQ

Nomad

Casket NPC’s

Night-gazer

Sea Monster

Gano

Avatars

Zombie Minigame

Hoilday Quest

Achievement Shop

Skilling Zone

Monster Teleport

Comp Cape Customizer
[video]http://gyazo.com/db171a60aff6c5ff06b64ae1aaf1bb8c[/video][/SPOILER]

[/CENTER]
